name: Chocolate Cake
ingredients: Flour, sugar, cocoa powder, eggs, butter, milk
instructions: 1. Preheat oven... 2. Mix dry ingredients... 3. Beat eggs and butter... 4. Combine dry and wet ingredients... 5. Bake in the oven...

name: Pasta Carbonara
ingredients: Spaghetti, bacon, eggs, Parmesan cheese, black pepper
instructions: 1. Cook pasta... 2. Fry bacon... 3. Beat eggs and cheese... 4. Combine cooked pasta, bacon, and egg mixture... 5. Serve with black pepper...
